NAME.Nominative: Martyrs Elias, Probos and Ares in Cilicia (+ 308)

LIFE.Copyright: Bulgakov Handbook. Copyright 1999-2008 Archpriest Eugene D. Tarris.

SAINT.LIFE: Born in Egypt, they suffered for Christ during the reign of Maximin in 308. Having gone to minister to Christian prisoners in Cilicia, they were seized in Ascalon and subjected to cruel torture. After torture St. Ares was burned, and Sts. Elias and Probus were beheaded by the sword.
